combat_recharging: ${{name}} needs a break before using ${{move}} again...
not_implemented: This feature is not yet implemented.
attack_very_effective: The attack did a lot of extra damage!
txmn_aardart_descr: It keeps count of every ant it has eaten, and celebrates significant numbers.
txmn_aardorn_descr: When born it is placed in an anthill and left to eat its way out.
txmn_abesnaki_descr: Each face is a different pattern, and some say the symbols spell out words in a dead language.
txmn_agnidon_descr: It prefers four legs, but can stand on two to open doors, push over trees or hold things.
txmn_agnigon_descr: It is called a "false dragon", because it appears to be a dragon, but actually evolved from a different line of ancient reptiles.
txmn_agnite_descr: It is playful, but must be taught early on to keep its fire in check.
txmn_allagon_descr: Allagon are drawn to relics made from the metals left behind by their ancestors, and will be violent to retrieve them.
txmn_anoleaf_descr: It considers the plants growing near it to be its brothers and sisters.
txmn_anu_descr: It is said that it enters others' dreams to search for its lost love.
txmn_araignee_descr: Pedants who say all spiders have eight legs are strangely quiet on the case of ARAIGNEE.
txmn_arthrobolt_descr: It feels uncomfortable commanding its fellow NUT and BOLT, and usually runs away. But then the NUT and BOLT have no one to instruct them.
txmn_av8r_descr: If the sun is out, it can fly as far or as high as it likes.
txmn_axylightl_descr: It lights the deep waters with its tail, marking a safe shelter for fish.
txmn_bamboon_descr: It fights with its bamboo staff, which it also uses for balance.
txmn_bigfin_descr: A whole ecosystem exists on its back, so it tries not to go underwater.
txmn_birdling_descr: The ignorant believe that it carries its own egg upon its back. It is the guard for a far more important egg than that.
txmn_bolt_descr: The presence of a BOLT makes a NUT clamp down harder and spark more energy.
txmn_botbot_descr: It is a universal robot that can be adapted for any purpose.
txmn_budaye_descr: It can convince any group to cooperate for the common good with some encouraging mewls and waves.
txmn_bugnin_descr: Its sword is actually an antenna grown and snapped off for that purpose.
txmn_bursa_descr: It rejects fire as "basic", and produces only the fire of the mind.
txmn_cairfrey_descr: A jolly piece of furniture who awoke one morning and decided to explore.
txmn_capiti_descr: It looks like a baby, but some specimens have been found that are hundreds of years old.
txmn_cardiling_descr: One wouldn't expect it to breathe fire, until it does.
txmn_cardinale_descr: It hates all predators with a passion, and makes war with them and their young when it can.
txmn_cardiwing_descr: Its song is remarkable, but few dare keep an explosive songbird.
txmn_cataspike_descr: It learns to fight from observation. Left to its own devices, it uses its spike to pick up rubbish.
txmn_cateye_descr: They say it blinks once a year, in honour of summer's end.
txmn_chenipode_descr: It bites onto shoelaces and trouser legs when it wants to travel.
txmn_chillimp_descr: It is rumoured to live atop snowy mountains, but no clear photo of it has ever been taken.
txmn_chloragon_descr: It hatches when an ancient egg is planted in fertile soil. When the eggs run out, there will be no more CHLORAGON.
txmn_cochini_descr: It is as intelligent and aware as a three-year old child. It tastes delicious.
txmn_coleorus_descr: It has existed, unchanged, for millions of years.
txmn_conifrost_descr: If it sneezes, an avalanche occurs. It has a permanent sniffle.
txmn_conileaf_descr: Foods placed in its pitcher are blended and pickled. They are used to store food without it going off.
txmn_corvix_descr: It arms its wings with bone shards from its victims.
txmn_cowpignon_descr: Some people dry it out and eat it as a medicinal enhancement.
txmn_criniotherme_descr: Its mane shines during the day, grows big and red at sunset, and blows away as ash at night.
txmn_dandicub_descr: After a litter is born, they float all over the world and never see their family again.
txmn_dandylion_descr: It gives birth to one litter in its life. Then it wanders the world trying to find them.
txmn_djinnbo_descr: It is mistakenly believed that it is a human who died in a fire. Actually, its relatives did.
txmn_dollfin_descr: Each one follows a ship from place to place, exploring the world.
txmn_dracune_descr: It is immobile during the day, but can wriggle and bite at night.
txmn_dragarbor_descr: When it feels it is coming to the end of its life, it travels to a graveyard where it plants itself. Its tail flower grows forever.
txmn_drokoro_descr: Once it had a family, but it ate its parents, and it ate its children, and it ate its mate, and it ate all of its kind.
txmn_dune pincher_descr: These hermits will wrap themselves in whatever is closest. In the desert, that is the burial shrouds of long-dead pharaohs.
txmn_eaglace_descr: When it takes flight, clouds form. When it claps its wings, hail falls.
txmn_elofly_descr: An ELOFLY on its own is patient and wise, but when it flocks in great numbers it becomes violent and impulsive.
txmn_elostorm_descr: Kings and queens, the ELOSTORM rule their people and have great ambition.
txmn_elowind_descr: The lieutenants of the ELOFLY family, ELOWIND shepherd the flock and keep it focused.
txmn_embazook_descr: It is trained for use in war and it knows no other life.
txmn_embra_descr: It eats everything it can to grow big enough to become a RUPTION.
txmn_eruptibus_descr: Smiths work with it, heating up metals in its caldera.
txmn_exapode_descr: It waves its legs to attract attention, but mostly people just run away.
txmn_eyenemy_descr: It feeds on beautiful views and other spectacular sights.
txmn_eyesore_descr: It remembers everything it has ever seen, but not the order that it has seen it in.
txmn_flacono_descr: It is totally unafraid of adversaries, and will attack an enemy of any size without hesitation.
txmn_flambear_descr: It can be tracked from the trail of boiled berry bushes and roasted trout it leaves in its wake.
txmn_fluoresfin_descr: When threatened, it huddles together with other Fluoresfin to create a large blinding light to disorientate predators.
txmn_fluttaflap_descr: It feeds on impurities, so it returns purified blood to those it sucks on.
txmn_foofle_descr: When one is in danger, all FOOFLE hear its cries, wherever they are.
txmn_forturtle_descr: It heats its shell to read the future from the cracks that emerge.
txmn_foxfire_descr: FOXFIRE cubs are found in fires that burned out overnight. No one knows where they come from.
txmn_frondly_descr: It can do anything with its prehensile tail, even shake hands and pick fruit.
txmn_gectile_descr: It is so quick and light that it can walk on leaves.
txmn_ghosteeth_descr: It smiles because it knows how everyone it meets is going to die.
txmn_grimachin_descr: It was made by a toy company to be a pet, but was too dangerous.
txmn_grinflare_descr: It is said that each is the walking heart of a volcano.
txmn_grintot_descr: It is a GRINTROCK or GRINFLARE that has experienced erosion.
txmn_grintrock_descr: It feeds by sitting out in thunderstorms, waiting to be struck by lightning.
txmn_hampotamos_descr: It nibbles on RINOCEREED, clearing away dead skin, moss and weeds.
txmn_hatchling_descr: When an egg does not want to hatch and begin its next life stage, it becomes a HATCHLING.
txmn_heronquak_descr: The crystal on its chest is mistaken for a diamond by poachers. It melts when it is removed from HERONQUAK's body.
txmn_hydrone_descr: It utilises an experimental technology that creates power from water.
txmn_ignibus_descr: When threatened it retreats into its shell and cools down dramatically by venting steam. It could be mistaken for a rock.
txmn_incandesfin_descr: Its entire body has massively grown in size. However, its light is still the exact same.
txmn_jemuar_descr: The gems on its back are the type found when it was born. There are extensive ROCKITTEN breeding facilities over diamond veins.
txmn_k9_descr: It is a helpful companion that can pull a tonne of weight.
txmn_katacoon_descr: It stays in a meditative pose for its chrysalis, moving only to jab enemies.
txmn_katapill_descr: It is born fighting. It has to punch out of its eggshell or be trapped.
txmn_komodraw_descr: It uses its claws to carve its firearm out of wood, and uses it for powerful ranged attacks.
txmn_lambert_descr: It is placed in its nut by its parent, who then sends it into the world.
txmn_lapinou_descr: When SQUABBITS were taken as fashionable pets, they adapted to domestic life and lost their violent natures.
txmn_legko_descr: Long thought to be legless, its leaves are actually vestigial limbs.
txmn_lightmare_descr: It lurks in the depths of the ocean, luring any unsuspecting prey using its light right into its large, gaping mouth.
txmn_manosting_descr: It floats across the tops of cities, contemplating sharks.
txmn_masknake_descr: When frightened or aggressive, it flashes a beautiful pattern with its tail.
txmn_memnomnom_descr: It is said that each one's mask is the face of a different dead king.
txmn_miaownolith_descr: It can speak the human tongue, but only to say cryptic riddles.
txmn_moloch_descr: It can stiffen or soften its skin to respond to friends and foes.
txmn_mrmoswitch_descr: These cheeky robots are used for their fine motor skills, but they love pranks.
txmn_narcileaf_descr: When a SHYBULB has restored a garden to glory, it morphs and proudly takes credit for its work.
txmn_noctalo_descr: It inhabits only places abandoned by humans - castles, graveyards and sewers.
txmn_noctula_descr: It eats bugs and PIPIS eat fruit, so despite living in close proximity they do not compete.
txmn_nostray_descr: It can smell anything in the ocean, no matter how far away.
txmn_nudiflot_female_descr: It eats and stores the poison of the sea creatures that it feeds upon.
txmn_nudiflot_male_descr: Its feathery antennas snap off if it is attacked, confusing the predator.
txmn_nudikill_descr: They are called Dark Bishops because their heads are reminiscent of a bishop's hat.
txmn_nudimind_descr: It dreams of oceans under other skies.
txmn_nut_descr: In the great ships that cross the oceans, thousands of NUT and BOLT provide power and hold the steel plating together.
txmn_ouroboutlet_descr: The circuit focuses energy, creating a new type of electricity called griefed-lightning.
txmn_pharfan_descr: At the watering hole it keeps its friends RINOCEREED and HAMPOTAMOS well watered.
txmn_picc_descr: It accompanies divers, providing much needed oxygen.
txmn_pigabyte_descr: Scientists found that the best computers have organic implants.
txmn_pipis_descr: Its cries are considered a bad omen, but it is a gentle creature.
txmn_polyrock_descr: It disguises itself as a human child to sneak into dojos and learn from martial arts masters.
txmn_possessun_descr: It is a ghost that inhabits a dead CAIRFREY.
txmn_propellercat_descr: Is it a new species, or just the pet of an inventor?
txmn_prophetoise_descr: Its heavenly fire is something foes rarely see coming.
txmn_puparmor_descr: Its cocoon is so hard, people are knocked out if a PUPARMOR is dropped on them. They were once loaded into cannons and catapults.
txmn_pyraminx_descr: It has a tomb hidden somewhere in the land. If it finds it, it can sleep.
txmn_pythwire_descr: Observations of wild PYTHWIRE inspired the inventor of the first electrical outlet.
txmn_rabbitosaur_descr: Its tunnels are extensive and wide, the site of tremendous wars between burrows.
txmn_rhincus_descr: It has some properties of a reptile and some of a bird.
txmn_rockat_descr: Despite its considerable weight, its footfalls are silent.
txmn_rockitten_descr: It uses its tiny rock ears for snuggling.
txmn_ruption_descr: Once Embra's flame becomes hot enough, it engulfs its entire body, essentially replacing it in the process.
txmn_sampsack_descr: A scientist wanted to separate his personalities, but he split his body.
txmn_sampsage_descr: A scientist took a drug that made him clever by day and violent by night.
txmn_sapragon_descr: In olden times, each element had a mighty dragon - but those creatures have diminished and are rare in these days.
txmn_sapsnap_descr: Its terrific anger is off putting, but it passes quickly.
txmn_sclairus_descr: When a crop is left unharvested - be it from laziness or disaster - its scarecrow becomes a dark and living creature.
txmn_seirein_descr: It grows lonely in the swamps, so it burns brightly to draw travellers near - but it is painfully shy and flits away when they approach.
txmn_shammer_descr: In ancient times it hunted RHINCUS beneath ashen skies.
txmn_sharpfin_descr: It is invisible in the water, being visible only when it leaps out of the water to drag animals on the shore back into the deep.
txmn_shybulb_descr: When a garden is neglected, a SHYBULB moves in and quietly tends the droopy plants.
txmn_sludgehog_descr: It lives in rubbish, and eats it too. Its spikes seem sharp, but it can soften them at will.
txmn_snarlon_descr: It does not fly, but its feet never touch the ground. The king of paradox.
txmn_sockeserp_descr: An otherwise formiddable enemy, SOCKESERP is easily dispatched if it gets tangled up.
txmn_spighter_descr: It's not fair that something so good at sneaking up on people, can't be snuck up on itself.
txmn_squabbit_descr: To prove themselves, they will fight tooth and nail over even the smallest thing.
txmn_strella_descr: Its tails are lures to convince bugs to bite them and be trapped.
txmn_sumchon_descr: It uses its weight to trip much larger enemies. It is as dense as a star.
txmn_tigrock_descr: It is said that it had to invent itself because an evolution was not designed.
txmn_tikoal_descr: The guardian of a forest-dwelling people, it keeps guard and resolves disputes.
txmn_tikorch_descr: It is the intermediary between forest and volcano, between sun and earth.
txmn_toufigel_descr: It appears to be a fluffy insect, but it is actually a reptile coated in soft snow.
txmn_tourbidi_descr: If you find a circle of mushrooms or clover, it is a place where TOURBIDI dance.
txmn_trapsnap_descr: Its head is the only part of its body that doesn't grow as it ages.
txmn_tumblebee_descr: It builds hives that are perfect spheres, with the TUMBLEBEE inside just rolling about and buzzing with laughter.
txmn_tumbleworm_descr: When they have outgrown their honeycomb eggs, they drop to the ground face first.
txmn_tweesher_descr: The colder the weather, the harder its beak. At below 0 degrees, it is harder than diamond.
txmn_vamporm_descr: It thirsts for blood, but must make do with tree sap.
txmn_velocitile_descr: It can outrun a bullet, but only when it has warmed up.
txmn_vivicinder_descr: It makes its nest in long-burning fires, either of its own creation or in memorials, smithies and glassworks.
txmn_vivipere_descr: It hatches in great numbers in the summer, but the rest of its lifespan is a mystery.
txmn_viviphyta_descr: It is the king of snakes - or at least believes itself to be such.
txmn_viviteel_descr: It takes the armour of a fallen warrior and repurposes it for a shell.
txmn_vivitrans_descr: The cold focuses VIVITRANS' mind to a keen edge.
txmn_vivitron_descr: Early philosophers used VIVITRON as evidence that natural forces can be tamed and controlled.
txmn_volcoli_descr: It is the spirit of a forest. Its hair changes with the seasons.
txmn_weavifly_descr: When it is heavy with egg, it becomes unable to fly.
txmn_wrougon_descr: Each Wrougon is born with a patch of rust larger than the patch of its parents.
txmn_yiinaang_descr: It was born the first time a star fell into a black hole.
txmn_zunna_descr: Cheerful ZUNNA sucks up all the food it can find into its stomach.
healmytuxemon: Do you want to heal your Tuxemon?
door_problems: The door is stuck and won't open...
empty_pot: It's an empty pot, maybe someone will plant something here
purple_flowers: Somebody planted some sweet smelling purple flowers!
orange_flowers: Someone planted some beautiful orange flowers!
famous_statue: It's a statue of a former Tuxemon master. The name is weathered away...
famous_statue2: It says: For our beloved friends and heroes of all, the wywen
cotton_town_fountain: It's a fountain. A lot of coins are at the bottom
tree: This tree looks happy and healthy!
professor_dialog:
Professor: 
 Ah, yes. The very person I've been wanting to meet.
I've heard that you want to learn about Tuxemon.
Tuxemon are little animals, some call them monsters, that we befriend and use to battle other Tuxemon.
I was wondering, I just received three new Tuxemon for research and I would like to give you one.
professor_dialog6.1: Professor: An excellent choice! Hydrone is a water Tuxemon
professor_dialog6.2: Professor: A superb choice! Rockitten is an earth Tuxemon
professor_dialog6.3: Professor: A great choice! Fruitera is a wood Tuxemon
professor_dialog7: Professor: I hope to see you around! I'm about to head on a journey, so maybe we'll meet up sometime.
karrianna_dialog1: Karrianna: I've been training for the past month! Nobody has beaten me yet!
karrianna_dialog2: Well... You were the first trainer I've faced...
xero_hideout1: Xero Institute for Tuxemon Research and Advancement ahead.
xero_grunts_block: This area is under construction, it should be done soon.
waiting_for_misa: Our leader would like to talk with you. When you are ready, talk to my friend next to me.
teleport?: Are you ready to meet our leader?
ouch: Sorry, but this may hurt a bit...
maybe_sometime_again?: Okay, I'll be here when you are ready.
youcantleave: The doors are locked from the outside... Is there a key somewhere?
a_serious_discussion: ???: I have been observing you for a while now, I'm glad my followers managed to grab you without harm.
Oh, where are my manners! I am Misa, Premier of the Xero Institute for Tuxemon Research and Advancement.
Misa: hmmm... That sounds like a good name for someone who illegally owns a Tuxemon.
oops: Oh. I guess you didn't know that...
You shouldn't be afraid, Having a Tuxemon by your side is the best thing ever to happen to you.
backstory: About thirty years ago, a group called Omnichannel started controlling the media. Soon after, nobody was allowed to express themselves via the media.
So people decided to use Tuxemon as messengers and to settle disputes. About ten years ago, the crackdown on Tuxemon was initiated.
Now, only approved persons can own and raise Tuxemon. My group uses Tuxemon for research. That's why we all have them.
You are unusual. You are not approved by Omnichannel. You might be the trainer we have been waiting for.
Omnichannel, as ruthless as they are, are not the only threat we have here. There is another organization called Spyder.
You shouldn't have to worry too much about them. They aren't too active around here.
Now, we'll send you back on your journey. Only if you agree to help us against Omnichannel.
Otherwise, we will report you to Omnichannel ourselves. And you will lose everything. We are always watching.
backstory9: What do you say? Will you help us?
sorryfurthis: Good choice. Sorry, this will only sting a little
mwah: ???: What do you want? ... ... ... Well too bad. You're not getting in here even though your clothes are tastefully done.
Allie: Yes, this is the Omnichannel, I'm just a lowly guard though. Who are you?
Hmm. A strong name. My house is not too far, maybe... after work... you could show me your strength?
... ... No! what do you mean no? Unless... ... You're Jess's new boyfriend aren't you! She played me this whole time!
itslockedboi: Allie locked the door behind her...
kmere: Why don't you come over here and talk to me?
theinfo: I'm sorry about that scene, Allie is sometimes hard to deal with, unlike my daughter Jess.
Oh! Where are my manners. My name is Ae... You know what? I'll just write it.
It's pronounced ahbluh, but everyone just calls me Able. You can call me that, I guess...
Aeble: I'm the CEO here at the Omnichannel, every broadcast you see, gets approved by me.
Now, I'm not the only one that does their part, we have a board that helps us administrate the districts
The board has been reelected since it was formed. They've done a great job though, so it makes sense.
Omnichannel's goal is to open up the world to all. The only way to do that though, to make everyone equal,
We started with confiscation, but most Tuxemon managed to escape. So we went to extreme measures.
Our sister organization Spyder developed a drug that could change Tuxemon.
It isolated a portion of the brain that every Tuxemon mysteriously has and overloaded it.
Once the Gage Paludal Lamina was overloaded with electricity, their will to resist faded and they became docile.
Because of this, a few species are dead, Rockitten, Fruitera, and Hydrone specifically.
This doesn't matter now though. This generation now doesn't even know what Tuxemon are unless they work for us.
The birthrate is at an all time high, and approval of the Omnichannel has not fallen since the year before the restriction
Tuxemon are a perversive curse that destroys humanity. Omnichannel has fixed that and imposed order.
Tuxemon destroy and anyone who says otherwise is lying. Sorry, I must head to work.
liela_goes_to_battle: If you are going to disturb me while I pick berries, I'm just going to have to challenge you!
Cathedral_Center: Cathedral Center: We Live to Serve
Cotton_Mart: Get the scoop at the Scoop Store!
Cotton_Town_Sign:
Welcome to Cotton Town: A Growing Force 
 
^ Cotton Town --- Route 1 v
column1: A rare and ancient column. This used to be a temple.
column2: A rare and ancient column. Other ruins from the same culture can be found in Route 3.
cityparksign: Welcome to City Park: A Taste of the Wild
route2speech2: Be more considerate the next time you push someone. The cliff goes down farther than it looks...
route2speech3: Although that may not be a bad thing...
I know, everyone needs me to lead, but with everything going on...
But you don't want to listen to me... do you?
notalk: You insensitive person! You'll listen to me anyway!
spillit: You know that I am the leader of the Xero institute and that I recruited you to fight them. But you don't know something else.
Allie, who you met before... What? I told you we would be watching, you don't have to be surprised by it.
spillit3: Whatever... Allie is my sister and means the world to me, so it destroyed me when I found out he had taken her to HQ.
spillit4: It may not seem like a bad thing, but it is. Do you know what they do to them? DO YOU!?
spillit5: Because neither do I... All I know is that no one has ever left Omnichannel after being recruited.
spillit6: Anyways... it doesn't concern you. All that matters is bringing down Omnichannel.
spillit7: I'm sorry for troubling you with my issues. City Park is up ahead when you want to move on
leavemealone: We used to play here all the time when we were younger...
iamknight: What are you doing here? You know that only knights are allowed through city park.
... ... ... Hmm... So you're trying to get to Leather Town...
Well, I guess you could enter the challenge if you want. The only problem is that you'll need a Tuxemon...
I'm sure we can lend you one. Are you up for the challenge?
sorry: Okay, well... when you're ready, I'll still be here...
splendid: You will? Splendid! Now, to find you a suitable Tuxemon...
... ... You already have a Tuxemon? Well, I'm sure that you'd be able to handle yourself well...
cottonnurse: Welcome to the Cotton Town Tuxecenter!
tabanurse: Welcome to the Taba Town Tuxecenter!
Do you want to heal your Tuxemon?
okaythen: Okay! Just give me a second and I will heal your Tuxemon!
okaythen2: Well, it looks like your Tuxemon are full of energy! Here they are!
